challenges.title: Base64 Rune
challenges.description: Decode the arcane string and whisper it back: ZmxhZ3tzdXBlcl9iYXNpYzRfbnJ1bn0=
challenges.hint: Try base64; maybe the rune is reversed?

challenges.title: Cron of the Gremlins
challenges.description: From "syslog.txt" determine the gremlin cron that runs every 13 minutes and outputs the secret.

challenges.title: SUID Relic
challenges.description: Analyze the given ls -la output and identify which binary's odd perms reveal the relic.
challenges.hint: SUID root on writable path = danger.

challenges.title: Hash of the Novice
challenges.hint: Common hashes map to common words.

challenges.title: JWT Jinx
challenges.description: A JWT uses 'none' algorithm. Decode the claim 'relic'.

challenges.title: Stego Sprite
challenges.description: An image hides a zip. Recover it to find: flag{...}
